instructions: From the Home screen, swipe up and then tap Settings > Display & gestures . Tap Advanced > Smart display . Tap a clock style you want to use. Tap Settings options , and do the following: Select Motion launch to show Smart display when you lift up the phone while the screen is off. Select Always on if you want Smart display to be shown when the screen is off. To use lesser battery power, set the schedule when to show Smart display .
